2072-2000-fuel cell lifetime hours.name: fuel cell lifetime hours
2072-2000-fuel cell lifetime hours.comment:
Between 2000 and 4000 hours for passenger cars.
For MDV and HDV, FC are assumed to be sturdier and used at lower intenisty.
Hence, around 5000 hours in 2020, 7000 hours in 2050.

2102-2000-CNG pump-to-tank leakage.name: CNG pump-to-tank leakage
2102-2000-CNG pump-to-tank leakage.comment:
Leakage represented as a fraction of CNG input.
Includes leakage from Delivery, Station tank, Continuous leaks at stations, Fuelling nozzle, Vehicle fuel tank and Vehicle manual vent.
